QuestData.Title: Operation: Gnomeregan
QuestData.Description: Momentarily, the multi-phased assault upon Gnomeregan will begin and Mekgineer Thermaplugg and his men will be brought to justice! Too long has Thermaplugg festered in the depths of our home, defended by a corrupt and irradiated army.$B$BThe assault begins in but a moment! Be ready recruit, this fight will not be for the faint-hearted.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help King Mekkatorque with the assault on Gnomeregan.
